subject: Re: Novari Collective Quote Platform - Moodboard updates

Many thanks

Kerri Fuchs

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
As discussed with Heath, we are in the process of updating the Novari Collective Styling Quote Platform.


Attached are 13 Mood board jpgs that need to be uploaded to the platform. These need to replace all previous mood boards.


Please can you notify us when these have been uploaded and activated.


Many Thanks

Kerri Fuchs
